source:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Varthon is in a hurry, but not in such a hurry that he would deny a helping hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
スリザーバウのヴァルソンは、冒険者に急ぎの頼みがあるようだ

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “tuktu” to assure Karnes you are not an enemy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_00チャットの「Say」モードで『のばら』と入力し
カルネスに声をかける

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_01<tab>Search the designated location for Slitherbough serum.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_01<tab>指定地点を調べ、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E5701 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the Slitherbough serum to Karnes.
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_001<tab>You! You're that guest Master Matoya was telling us about. Please, you have to help me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_001あんた、外から来たって人だろ？
頼む、力を貸してくれよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_002<tab>I've searched high and low, but I can't find my friend Karnes anywhere. I fear he's run off to Fort Gohn again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_002友達のカルネスって奴が、
ひとりでゴーンの砦に行っちまったみたいなんだ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_003<tab>It's where we grew up, but it was abandoned years ago after the sin eaters attacked.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_003あそこは俺たちの生まれ故郷なんだが、
数年前に罪喰いに襲われて、廃墟しか残ってない。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_004<tab>The place is teeming with all manner of beasts now, and Master Matoya has expressly forbidden anyone from setting foot there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_004今じゃ、獰猛な魔物の縄張りだから、
近寄らないようにって、マトーヤ様からも強く言われてた。
でもあいつ、いつも砦のことを気にしてて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_005<tab>I don't know what's gotten into him lately, but we have to find him, before he gets hurt. If you should find him first, you'll want to tell him our password─tuktu. He's the skittish sort, so don't delay in telling him so he'll know you mean no harm.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_005頼む、ゴーンの砦の辺りで「カルネス」を捜すのを手伝ってくれ！
見つけたら、仲間の証になる合言葉「のばら」って、
声をかけてくれればいい、頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “tuktu” and allay Karnes's fears.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_SYSTEM_100_010チャットの会話モードを「Say」モードにして、
キーボードやソフトウェアキーボードで、
『のばら』を含む好きな言葉を入力しましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_011<tab>You... You're from Slitherbough? Varthon must have sent you, then.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_011君、スリザーバウから来てくれたのか？
もしかして、ヴァルソンが心配して……？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_012<tab>I was fine until that damned beetle. It's only a scratch, but I'm starting to feel numb, and my vision's grown clouded.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_012獣に襲われてね……毒爪で少し引っかかれてさ。
おかげで身体が痺れていて、目も霞んでよく見えないんだ。
なんとか木の根元まで、這ってきたけど……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_013<tab>Worst of all, I dropped my only vial of serum somewhere in these damned woods. Could you find it for me?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_013いつも携帯してる解毒薬さえ飲めたらマシになるんだけど、
逃げる途中で落としたみたいでさ。
近くに「」がないか、探してもらえないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_015<tab>The vial should be somewhere close by.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_015<tab>この近くに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E5701 /var>」がないか、探してもらえないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_031<tab>There you are. Did you find it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_031……さっきの君かい？
「」、見つかったか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_032<tab>Thank you. I should be fine now after a bit of rest.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_032ふぅ、毒のほてりが引いていくよ……。
少し休めばよくなるはずだ、迷惑かけてすまないな。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_033<tab>What were you thinking coming back here? You could've been killed!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_VARTHON_000_033危険だなんてわかってただろ？
どうしてひとりで、砦まで……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_034<tab>I had to, Varthon. For my father...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE010_03444_KARNES_000_034置き去りにした大事なものを、どうしても探しに来たかったんだ。
ずっと、あの日からずっと……。
